name: Chamaeleon Design System
description:
Welcome to Chamaeleon Design System 1.0


  • Carefully organized with Variants.
  • Designed using Auto Layout 3.0.


Chameleon is a simple but powerful design system made for Figma, for agile your prototypes and escalate your component's production.


Universal, Minimalistic and Versatile

Those are the Design Principles for Chamaeleon. Tailor-Made to be used, abused and customized the way you want. And all that facilitated by Variants, so you can customize easily all the components and your variations.


Chamaeleon comes with:

  • Base Components and Components ready to use. And the list will always grow.
  • Dark and Light theme for all the components, no exception.
  • Elements easy to customize and prototype.
  • Monthly updates based on the feedback's community.

Duplicate now!


CHAMAELEON IS ON 1.0 VERSION, SO IT WILL BE MISSING THINGS AND SOME ASPECTS MAY NEED SOME ADJUSTS, SO PLEASE, DON'T HESITATE TO COMMENT AND TELL ME WHAT YOU WANT FOR THE NEXT UPDATE üòÅ
